剧情里两个机器人角色的塑造很生动，前几章Glados是反派的时候喜欢阴阳怪气的伏笔在同伴期间显得很可爱。Wheatly前期多讨喜的角色抢过权限后也被腐化，最后被送进太空有点心疼。
关卡设计很巧妙，旧Aperture的章节废弃巨型工厂风格很震撼，不过也是场景原因卡了挺久。boss战突然跳出时间限制一下子慌了，试了挺久过了很有成就感。

Aaah Portal 2... I've always wondered why the reception of this game was so positive, not only on the internet, but also among my friends. I never really understood it, because I don't like puzzle games and solving a puzzle never really gave me that dopamine hit that I get by playing Fps games or games with character building.
When I eventually got to play Portal 2 you better believe I was shocked. The puzzles were great, the narration was entertaining, the jokes and the dialogues were actually funny and the game still looked great even on the aging source engine. It was blasphemous that I refused to play this game just because of the puzzle genre stereotype that I was so used to. I still didn't get that dopamine hit I was crawing for, but the game gave me something else instead - a memorable story, characters and a satisfying ending.
Also the humour in this game can be outstanding, but not everyone will enjoy it and some people may be annoyed by it. I for one loved it, because it's the exact type of humour I love, but that is not universaly true for everyone. Just be aware of the possibility that it could completely miss the mark for you. 
Otherwise the game is amazing, please try it If you haven't before, snatch it on a sale and enjoy both the singleplayer's story as well as the co-op with a friend - you won't regret it.

Best game ever, the idea of going from one place to another with a hole is simple yet has endless potential, and this game just shows how much you can do with such idea. The characters and places this game provides is what makes this game even more unique and astounding, the challenging puzzles and its deady traps that twist my brain makes me want to solve even more. The amount of content you're getting too is unbelievably the best, I never knew how much I can get with only a dollar. 10/10 game, 11 even, I love this game so much
